answerText: sigma algebra [10] Sets in Borel sigma algebras of the real line can be assigned a Lebesgue one of these functions. They give a generalized notion of the length of a subset of the real line.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Minnesota A  | 10 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: If these are formed from open sets of a set then they are called Borel. For 10 points each: [10] Name this collection of subsets of a set X that contains the empty set, is closed under complementation and is closed under countable union.
